adminMessage: You are the administrator of this game
housePrizeTitle: The prize stays in the house!
name: Name
resultConfirmedAndBoardClosed: The result has been confirmed and the board is closed.
boardLockedWinnerFound: A winner has been found. Confirm the result or reset the board to continue.
boardLockedConfirmDetails: You must complete and confirm the prize details to select numbers.
infiniteRaffleDescription: This raffle does not have a number board. Register participants directly in the 'Register' tab.
boardLockedDescription: Search for a raffle by its reference or create a new one to start.
infiniteRaffleHomeDescription: No number limit. Ideal for draws.
noWinnersYet: No winners have been drawn yet.
enableNequiPaymentDescription: Allows users to pay using the Nequi button.
enablePaymentLinkDescription: Allows users to pay using the payment link.
activateRaffleWarning: You must activate or search for a raffle and confirm the prize details on the 'Board' tab to participate.
gameFinishedRegistrationDisabled: Registration of new participants is disabled because a winner has already been confirmed. Reset the board to start a new raffle.
activateRaffleToSeeParticipants: You must activate or search for a raffle on the 'Board' tab to see the participants.
recoverAdminAccessDescription: Enter the details to recover administrator access.
searchRaffleByRefDescription: Enter the reference of the raffle you want to find.
salesCollectionDescription: Here you can see the total collected so far.
shareRaffleAppDescription: Share this raffle app with your friends.
shareWithQRDescription: Scan this code to open the application.
selectCountryDescription: Choose your country to continue with the raffle activation. The price may vary.
generateTicketPrizeWarning: The prize must be defined to generate a ticket.
successfulPaymentNotification: Successful payment! Your number has been registered. You can generate your ticket in the 'Participants' tab.
installAppInfo: The app cannot be installed on this browser or is already installed.
numberAlreadyAssignedWarning: This number has already been assigned.
confirmDetailsFirstWarning: You must first confirm the prize details to select a number.
gameFinishedWarning: The game has finished. Reset the board to start over.
drawWinnerFirstWarning: You must draw a winner first.
resultConfirmedNotification: Result confirmed! The board has been locked.
completeAllFieldsWarning: Please complete all prize configuration fields, including the password.
resetBoardConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the board? This action will delete the current raffle and you will need to make another payment to create a new one.
boardResetSuccess: Board reset. You can now activate a new raffle.
infiniteModeDigitsWarning: The number for this mode must be {count} digits
numberLengthWarning: The number for this mode must be {count} digits
nequiPaymentPendingNotification: Number {number} registered for {name}! Your payment is pending confirmation by the administrator.
shareTicketMessage: Hi! Here is your ticket for the "{prize}" raffle. Good luck!
enterOrganizerPhoneWarning: Please enter the organizer's phone number.
phoneOrPasswordMismatch: The phone number or password do not match.
raffleNotFound: No raffle found with that reference.
enterValidWinningNumber: Please enter a valid winning number of {count} digits.
winnerNotification: The winner is {name} with the number {number}! (100% of the prize)
housePrizeNotification: Number {number} was not sold. The prize stays at home.
enterWinningNumberAndPrizeWarning: Please enter the main winning number first and ensure the prize value is defined.
noPrizeValueWarning: No prize value to calculate the prize. Make sure the prize value is valid.
winningNumberTooShortWarning: The winning number is too short to search for the last {count} digits.
partialWinnersNotification: Winners with the last {count} digits ({digits}): {winners} - Total Prize: {prize}
noPartialWinnersNotification: No winners found for the last {count} digits ({digits}).
adminNumberNotSet: The administrator's number is not configured.
contactAdminMessage: Hello, I am contacting you about the raffle.
backToHome: You have returned to the home screen.
allowPartialWinnersDescription: Enable to award prizes for the last 2 and 3 digits.
